title: New: Ugly Bunny – Shoplifters Of The World Unite (The Smiths Cover)
body:
A twisted, electro-pop cover of **The Smiths**.

It just shouldn’t work, should it? But wow, does **Ugly Bunny** do a good job on his version of _Shoplifters Of The World Unite_. Bold synth sections merge seamlessly with the unique, off-kilter vocals, that might not be Morrissey’s characteristic drawl, but they’re certainly a welcome substitute. It’s sure to anger every hardcore Smiths fan, and delight everyone else. Check it out below.
